verses.roman:
jarāsandho mama gurur
dvivido dayitaḥ sakhā
śambaro narako bāṇo
mayy eva kṛta-sauhṛdāḥ
tair ahaṁ sura-pakṣīyān
hatvā bhokṣye mahīṁ nṛpān

synonyms: jarāsandhaḥ—Jarāsandha; mama—my; guruḥ—elder (father-in-law); dvividaḥ—Dvivida; dayitaḥ—my dear; sakhā—friend; śambaraḥ—Śambara; narakaḥ—Naraka; bāṇaḥ—Bāṇa; mayi—for me; eva—indeed; kṛta-sauhṛdāḥ—who have strong friendship; taiḥ—with them; aham—1; sura—of the demigods; pakṣīyān—those who are allies; hatvā—killing; bhokṣye—will enjoy; mahīm—the earth; nṛpān—the kings.
translation: My elder relative Jarāsandha and my dear friend Dvivida are solid well-wishers of mine, as are Śambara, Naraka and Bāṇa. I will use them all to kill off those kings who are allied with the demigods, and then I will rule the earth.
